Achievements.Name: Bounty Hunter
Achievements.Description: Get a total of 50,000 BP.

Achievements.Name: Cure for the Afflicted
Achievements.Description: Defeat 100 Afflicted in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Revenant Reaper
Achievements.Description: Defeat 100 Revenants in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Knifin' Around
Achievements.Description: Defeat 100 enemies with the knife in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Fudge Them Up!
Achievements.Description: Defeat 50 enemies with physical attacks in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: And STAY Down
Achievements.Description: Perform 50 follow-ups in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: From the Shadows
Achievements.Description: Defeat 20 enemies with stealth attacks in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Flashlight Duty
Achievements.Description: Use Moira's light to stun 50 enemies in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: I Can Do Blunt Weapons
Achievements.Description: Use Moira's crowbar to defeat 50 enemies in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Brick Layer
Achievements.Description: Defeat 20 enemies with a brick as Natalia in the main campaign

Achievements.Name: Line 'Em Up!
Achievements.Description: Defeat two enemies with one shot in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Disarmed
Achievements.Description: Destroy 30 Revenants' weapon arms.

Achievements.Name: Unfriendly Skies
Achievements.Description: Shoot down 30 Afflicted in mid-jump in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Now That's Teamwork!
Achievements.Description: Have Moira stun an enemy and Claire follow up with a physical attack in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Friend Indeed
Achievements.Description: Save your captured partner ten times in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Fish in a Barrel
Achievements.Description: Defeat five enemies with one exploding bottle or one firebomb bottle in the main campaign.

Achievements.Name: Raiders of the Evil
Achievements.Description: Clear one Raid Mode mission.

Achievements.Name: Jammin'
Achievements.Description: Evaluate an item in Raid Mode.

Achievements.Name: I Saw, I Conquered
Achievements.Description: Clear one Gauntlet in Raid Mode.

Achievements.Name: "I Do Not Like Glasps," I Gasped
Achievements.Description: Defeat 20 Glasps in the main campaign.
